name: market for borehole heat exchanger, 150m | borehole heat exchanger, 150m | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6892/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'borehole heat exchanger, 150m', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the installation of a borehole heat exchanger, 150m for one average family house. The system is dimensioned to cover heating requirement of 10 kW, a heat distribution system of 50/40Â°C and a heat supply of approximately 20,000 kWh with 2,000 operating hours. It has also a mean cooling capacity of 8,25 kW, a extraction performance of 55 W/m and its lifetime is assumed to be 50 years. Its production represents all materials necessary to construct it and energy consumption during manufacturing.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
